Question
========

A person achieves a score of 7.6 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 8 with a standard deviation 2.3. The z-score of the person with 7.6 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -1.1
* -0.17
* -0.15

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-1.1: Incorrect
-0.17: Correct
-0.15: Incorrect
